name: Don'Yoku
description: If you love shoot ‘em up and you love ‘em hard, with glorious music, with screen filling bullet patterns and huge token cancels, then Don’yoku is just for you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Processor: 1.8 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT/s 4xx or equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8 Processor: 2.4 GHZ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 600 series or higher DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A great old school SHUMPS whit a fantastic OST!
Controls are crap. The game is crap. It doen't launch on some PCs. Don't buy it.
